system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.YIIZnklXaHYDx9Iq]{Shotgun Specialist}

Benefits

When firing a bolt, pump, lever, semi- or fully automatic shotgun, the Combat Point cost for a no-miss shot is 5 less. When using this feat, a no-miss shot may not be combined with a called shot. Additionally, when using a bolt, pump, lever, semi- or fully automatic shotgun, the character may make one standard melee buttstroke or bayonet attack with it for 0 CP, once per round.

Special

If a character selects the Shotgun Ace Feat, they may not select the Shotgun Expert Feat.
system.summary: -5 CP to No-miss shot, Free melee attack with shotgun once per round.
